content: कर्कटः {@--1@} A crab. {@--2@} Cancer, the fourth sign of the zodiac. {@--3@} A kind of crane. {@--4@} The fibrous root of a lotus. {@--5@} A thorn. {@--6@} The curved end of the beam of a balance. {@--7@} A kind of coitus (रतिबंध). {@--8@} The radius of a circle. {@--9@} Compass, circuit. {@--10@} A kind of pin or wedge. --टी {@--1@} A female crab. {@--2@} A kind of cucumber. {@--3@} The curved end of a balance. {@--4@} A small water-pot.
